sentences.sContent: Salt and sugar intermingle with each other.
sentences.sContent_eng: Salt and sugar intermingle with each other.
sentences.sCn: 糖和盐相互混合在一起。

sentences.sContent: In the image, dust is red, hot gas is green and white is where gas and dust intermingle. Foreground and background stars appear scattered through the image.
sentences.sContent_eng: In the image, dust is red, hot gas is green and white is where gas and dust intermingle. Foreground and background stars appear scattered through the image.
sentences.sCn: 在该图像中，尘埃为红色，热气体为绿色，气体与尘埃混合处为白色，前景和背景中的恒星遍布整个图像。

sentences.sContent: Women have more sensitive smell receptors than men and prefer certain scents only when they're fresh, such as androstenol, which is emitted when sweat and oxygen intermingle [source: Fox].
sentences.sContent_eng: Women have more sensitive smell receptors than men and prefer certain scents only when they're fresh, such as androstenol, which is emitted when sweat and oxygen intermingle [source: Fox].
sentences.sCn: 女人的嗅觉器官要比男人敏锐得多。 她们对某些气味有偏好，尤其当这些气味是新鲜的时候，比如男性荷尔蒙，当汗水和氧气混合时就会散发这种气味。
